item.title: Traffic Alert Collision Avoidance System (TCAS II) – Resolution Advisory (RA) Display System(s) – (VSI/RA) Both Displays Inop (EFB Not Installed)

numlitem.para: Traffic Alert (TA) visual display and audio functions are operative,
TA only mode is selected by crew, and
En route or approach procedures do not require its use.
Monitor operative indications and respond accordingly.

placard.para: Placard adjacent to affected TCAS/VSI indicator "RA INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
